item.title: How do i make it so i can drop stuff -.-
item.dc:creator: @Picoscape Picoscape
item.description:
@Picoscape wrote:

	// misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is
	// ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]");
	boolean a = true;
	if (!canUse(droppedItem)) {
		sendMessage("You must be a premium member to drop this item");
		return;
	}

if (playerRights >= 4) {
sendMessage(“You can’t drop items.”);
return;
}
if ((playerItemsN[slot] != 0) && (droppedItem != -1)
&& (playerItems[slot] == droppedItem + 1)) {
for (int element : noTrade) {
if (droppedItem == element) {
sendMessage(“You can’t drop this item”);
return;
}
}

If you ever find out how to get trading working, let me know.

item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

ya…how do i do that…here is the code I THINK. not shure that is causeing it -.-

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) { // misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is // ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]"); boolean a = true; if (!canUse(droppedItem)) { sendMessage("You must be a premium member to drop this item"); return; } if (playerRights >= 0) { sendMessage("You can't drop items."); return; } if ((playerItemsN[slot] != 0) && (droppedItem != -1) && (playerItems[slot] == droppedItem + 1)) { for (int element : noTrade) { if (droppedItem == element) { sendMessage("You can't drop this item"); return; } }

so i need to get rid of hat errrr…
